content: second st *single_crochet in next st 2sc in next st repeat from * around 18sts round 4 single_crochet in the back loop of each st around 18sts rnds 5-7 single_crochet in each st around 18sts round 8 single_crochet in each of the first 6sts decrease x3 single_crochet in each of the remaining 6sts 15sts please see special stitches as all decrease s within this pattern should be worked as invisible decreases round 9 single_crochet in each of the first 6sts decrease single_crochet in each of the remaining 7sts 14sts stuff the feet firmly and the legs lighter and lighter towards the top as you work as shown rnds 10 - 20 single_crochet in each st around 14sts if working underwear onto the doll fasten_off skin tone yarn now and attach different coloured yarn round 21 & 22 single_crochet in each st around 14sts fasten_off first leg leaving a long tail if you would like your doll to sit but not on second you should be at the right hand side of both legs as shown when looking at them from the back continue on to the… body continue to crochet in continuous spirals without joining the rounds using a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts if you need help with this next part please see this video on how to join the legs on the weebee and friends youtube channel this video shows the standard size weebee doll but the method is the same round 23 single_crochet in each of the first ^^7sts then take other leg as pictured and place it next to the first so that both feet are facing the same way then single_crochet into the ^^last st on the fastened off leg continue to single_crochet in each of the remaining 13sts around this leg and then single_crochet in each of the remaining 7sts around the first leg 28sts ^^please feel free to work more or less single_crochet at the start of round 23 to reach the side of the leg as pictured and to single_crochet into whichever st feels the most comfortable on the fastened off leg as you may be in a different position to me on the leg because of your own personal gauge/gauge see frequently asked questions to learn more about personal guage/gauge yarn and hook choice there may be a small hole between the legs when joined when you have finished the doll simply take a small piece of yarn and with your darning needle sew the hole closed or do as follows for the sitting option round 24 single_crochet in each st around 28sts round 25 single_crochet into each of the first 5sts decrease *single_crochet in each of the next 5sts decrease repeat from * around 24sts rnds 26 single_crochet
